questions.question: The Gain Matrix ‘G’ of power system becomes more ill-condition if the condition number is

explanations.a: The gain matrix is found from the Jacobian matrix, J and measurement error covariance matrix R. Formula for calculating G matrix is HT R-1 H. So, condition number is to not be increased.
explanations.b: The gain matrix is found from the Jacobian matrix, J and measurement error covariance matrix R. Formula for calculating G matrix is HT R-1 H. So, condition number should not be moderate in number.
explanations.c: The gain matrix is found from the Jacobian matrix, J and measurement error covariance matrix R. Formula for calculating G matrix is HT R-1 H. So, condition number is to be increased.
explanations.d: The gain matrix is found from the Jacobian matrix, J and measurement error covariance matrix R. Formula for calculating G matrix is HT R-1 H. So, condition number should not be one.

questions.question: The condition number for Gain Matrix ‘G’ is define as

answers.b: Ratio of largest to smallest eigenvalue

explanations.a: The condition number for Gain Matrix ‘G’ is not defined as Rank of Gain Matrix ‘G’
explanations.b: The condition number for Gain Matrix ‘G’ is not defined as Ratio of largest to smallest eigenvalue  .
explanations.c: The condition number for Gain Matrix ‘G’ is defined as GG-1
explanations.d: The condition number for Gain Matrix ‘G’ is not defined as Inverse of G.

questions.question: The solution of state estimation in power system is affected by

explanations.a: The solution of state estimation in power system is affected by Ill conditioning, Computer storage requirement, Time requirement.
explanations.b: The solution of state estimation in power system is affected by Ill conditioning, Computer storage requirement, Time requirement.
explanations.c: The solution of state estimation in power system is affected by Ill conditioning, Computer storage requirement, Time requirement.
explanations.d: The solution of state estimation in power system is affected by Ill conditioning, Computer storage requirement, Time requirement.

questions.question: State estimation of power system by only active and reactive power injection is same as

explanations.a: Before proceeding into the state estimation in power system, steady state condition of the system is achieved and it is found through load flow study.
explanations.b: Before proceeding into the state estimation in power system, steady state condition of the system is achieved and it is not found through Optimal Power flow analysis.
explanations.c: Before proceeding into the state estimation in power system, steady state condition of the system is achieved and it is not found through Economical dispatch.
explanations.d: Before proceeding into the state estimation in power system, steady state condition of the system is achieved and it is not found through load forecasting.

questions.question: In only real and reactive power injection, 2N number of elements of measurement vector ‘z’ is used to estimate ________ number of elements of state vector ‘x’

explanations.a: The reference bus voltages are not Zero.
explanations.b: All bus voltage angles are calculated based on the reference bus voltage which is zero.
explanations.c: The reference bus voltages are not Zero.
explanations.d: The bus voltage angles are calculated based on the reference bus voltage which is not  zero.
